title: How to use elements inside of a Polymer element?
Add legend to charts with datasets
Chart size is 0 when it is in not selected section of iron-pages
body:
It works just good when the chart is on a visible page, but when it on the page, that doesn't shown at the start time the chart dimensions are zeros.
```
<chart-line width="400" height="200"
	labels='["Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"]'
	values='[[10,14,20,25,13,9,40]]'
	colors='["253,180,92","247,70,74","70,191,189","148,159,177","77,83,96"]'>
	<canvas id="canvas" class="style-scope chart-line" width="0" height="0" style="width: 0px; height: 0px;"></canvas>
</chart-line>
```
